Accountant
Business Services Manager
  • Develop more balance between your career and home life as this firm is offering flexible hours 
  • Family orientated company that believe the best way to manage their staff and achieve productivity is to allow the staff to go home by 6pm every evening
  • 50 firm is based in the CBD and has over 5 Partners
  • Survived the GFC without losing any staff are now in the process of their development plan 
  • Expand with a further 3 Partners over the next 7 years
  • Currently they are looking for a Manager who would be willing to fill one of the Partnership poisitions in the next 2 years

    10 years including time with a Big 4 and CA qualified.  
Being a National Leader in recruitment of Business Services professionals, I can provide you access to the best firms in Australia. Whether you are looking for an International affiliated firm or a boutique environment, I can connect you with the right person for your next career move. Give me a call for a confidential discussion.

Victoria Gane

A teacher/coordinator of Marine Studies is required at an excellent school in Rockhampton. This P-12, coeducational independent school is one of the oldest and most reputable in Queensland. The school is located on extensive grounds, developed over the years to create the modern, superbly resourced institution that it is today. The school's marine studies programme and maritime vocational training are offered in co-operation with the Australian Maritime University. Coxswain courses are conducted and are available to the general public as well as students.

The successful candidate will be able to teach or coordinate Senior Marine Studies, Marine and Aquatic Practices, Certificate II in Recreational Studies and Middle School Marine Systems. Lessons will take place on campus and at the school’s waterfront outdoor education site.

To Apply:
  • Email your CV, quoting job reference 42475 to nbarton@smartteachers.com.au
  • Alternatively, please telephone Smart Teachers on 3112 8566

JobInformation.JobTitle: Intermediate Accountant / Light Senior 45 t0 55k Package
JobInformation.JobBody:
Prestigious Sydney Accountancy Practic with 3 partners has a newly created vacancy for an intermediate / Light Senior Accountant

  • North Sydney Location
  • Out standing opportunity in an out standing organisation
  • Srrong Team Environment

Intermediate Accountant / Light Senior 45 t0 55k Package

  • North Sydney Location
  • Out standing opportunity in an out standing organisation
  • Only apply if you have a minimum 2 years Australian experience

This prestigious Sydney Accountancy Practice with 3 partners has a newly created vacancy for an intermediate / Light Senior Accountant to join one of there progressive business services teams.

You will be trained and mentored by astute senior and supervisory staff and be given exposure to larger clients. Due to the size you have direct access to the partners and there knowledge.

CA studies are fully supported as is regular attendance to technical seminars and internal staff training.

The culture of the firm is professional and fun and can lead to overseas experiences if that is what you are after.

If you like working in a friendly, personal environment, possess excellent communication skills and are doing your CA, then look at this.

Do not miss this one!!!

Please email you details to..



To apply online, please click on the appropriate link below.
Please visit www.lloydharrington.com.au to view more jobs.
Apply

JobInformation.JobTitle: TERRITORY MANAGEMENT ROLE - GLOBAL MANUFACTURING COMPANY - LEADING THE WAY
JobInformation.JobBody:
• Global manufacturing company
  • Suppliers of quality imaging products
  • Territory management role

My client is a multinational manufacture and a leading supplier of quality imaging products to the colour printing, imaging and photography markets. Established for over 20 years, my client is looking for a Brisbane based Territory Manager to assist in their QLD operations.

The successful candidate will be responsible for maintaining existing customer relationships and selling to big retail chains. (ie) Bing Lee, Harvey Norman, Domain....etc with wholesale sales involved as well. Your great interpersonal skills will help you develop new business and build a good rapport with these clients.

My client is open to any type of technical sales experience background in fields such as computers, printers and IT peripherals in general. The ideal candidate will be able to kick goals and build strong rapport, while always maintaining a positive attitude and a hunger for success.

On offer is a base salary of $55-$65K + OTE $90K + $15K Car allowance.

So if youre a person who loves customer service, and loves to be rewarded for your strong selling skills, please apply now.

To find out more information on this role, apply with your resume on word format to l.fogwell@gemteq.com.au or phone 8243 1946 for a more confidential discussion.

Please note only short listed candidates will be shortlisted.

Please apply below, or call Leana Fogwell on 02 8243 1946 for a confidential discussion.
Apply

  • One of Australia's premier litigation practices
  • Work with multiple partners
  • Excellent salary

Are you an ambitious and passionate litigator currently working at another highly regarded city firm? If so this could be the job for you! My client is looking for someone to work on a major matter with two of the firms most high profile partners. You will also work on other matters and the firm has particular expertise in construction and commercial dispute resolution, insolvency, corporate regulation, competition and trade practices. This is the chance for you to take the next step in your JavaJ2EE development career, working and learning from some of the top developers in the business.  This tier 1 blue-chip company has 2 vacancies for Junior to Mid level developers.

 

In this role you will be working closely with the senior developers on Greenfield projects and enhancementsdevelopments to existing systems.  This is a challenging role as you will be working with a wide range of technologies and be dealing with both internal and external stakeholder therefore excellent communication skills are ESSENTIAL.

 

Requirements

  • 2 years development experience
  • JavaJ2EE programming skills
  • JSP, Spring, JMS and Eclipse
  • Strong Database skills SQLOracle
  • IT Degree or relevant
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Experience working in enterprise environments

 

It’s time for the next step - APPLY now.  Email: sgilmour@aurec.com or call 02 9993 1066.

DUE TO HIGH LEVELS OF RESPONCE I WILL ONLY BE CONTACTING SUITIBLE CANDIDATES

Our client that manufacture a range of conveyor systems for the mining and material handling industry are looking for Trade Qualified staff.

Our client is a large engineering company in Wetherill Park that manufacture a range of conveyor systems for the mining and material handling industry are looking for Trade Qualified staff.

Working on a contract basis with this fantastic company you will need to have the following to be considered:

  • Trade Qualified as a Mechanical Fitter
  • Able to work unsupervised
  • Experience within the Engineering field
  • Ability to read/work from drawings
  • Produce high quality product
  • High attention to detail
  • Willing to work overtime

So if you are looking for a position with a good company, submit your resume online or call Workforce during business hours on 8788 6600.




To apply, please click on the appropriate link below.
Visit www.workforce.com.au to view available jobs or to register with us.

Apply

JobInformation.JobTitle: Senior Store Managers and Assistant Managers - This is the role you want!!!
JobInformation.JobBody:
• Celebrated national variety retail company
  • Competitive salary of up to $75k (Store Managers) and $50k (Assistant Managers
  • Opportunities to progress and learn new skills

Our Client is Australia’s fastest growing specialised variety retailer with a strong history in providing amazing service and value for money for families right across Australia. Well known for their high quality products and commitment to giving you the best of the best, they are also recognised as an employer of choice in the retail world. 

 

Sick of feeling like you’re just another number? Never suffer through that again!  This family focused, team oriented company have got what you’re looking for!

These varied roles would suit highly experienced retail managers who thrive on driving sales and creating a team environment that is buzzing with excitement. Your main responsibility is to contribute towards the growth and profitability of the Company through effective implementation of Company Policy and guidelines.

The ideal candidate should possess the ability to lead by example, and be able to demonstrate their experience with the following:

  • Staff management, building a successful team
  • High volume stock and merchandising management
  • Strong customer service ethic
  • Achieving designated sales and profit objectives
  • Big Box or FMCG experience essential
, building a successful team

In return for your passion & outstanding performance across all KPI’s, we will reward you with an attractive remuneration package, generous staff discounts and extensive career progression opportunities!!!...

Only those who are enthusiastic about managing a team who enjoy working in a busy and fun atmosphere need apply.  All applications are strictly confidential.  Please send your resume directly to elee@integralhrm.com to register your interest.

We have a role available for an immediate start as a Network Engineer to join a Small business of 2 Technicians.

  • Start ASAP
  • IT Consultancy Firm

 

Immediate start for a 2 month trial period.
 

Main Responsibilities:-

  • Onsite and Phone support for Windows Users
  • Server management, Windows 2003 and Windows 2008
  • Installation and repair of Computer systems. 

 

Main Skill Sets:-

  • The ability to work unsupervised and also as part of a team
  • Must have a Valid Australian Full Drivers License and ability to drive a manual car.
  • Good communication and Excellent English.
  • Server 2003 Server 2008 Skills.
  • Install and Manage Routers.
  • Networking Understanding.
  • Problem Solving Skills.


 

This is a fantastic opportunity for a Network Engineer with excellent communication skills who can deal with stressful situations. A good opportunity to have hands on Training and Exposure to Servers. Preference if you live near office near Sunshine.



Email resume to.
Jobs@itbasement.com

SALES REPRESENTATIVE Well established Electrical Agency with Leading Brands requires a Representative based in Townsville to service existing accounts in the Townsville, Cairns & Mt Isa area on a regular call centre. Experience in the electrical retail industry would be an advantage. An attractive salary package which will include basic salary, commission and a company vehicle will be discussed at the interview. Please reply in writing to: The Manager Tom Jack Agencies PO Box 1417, Aitkenvale QLD 4814 Closing date: 9th April, 2010

This ad appeared in the Townsville Bulletin on 31/MAR/10

Dental Assistant - F/T
 
• To join our friendly & supportive 3 Dentist team
• 4 days plus Saturday
• Includes all aspects of practice activity, (including in surgery & front desk)
• Would suit an applicant with experience
 
Please email your resume to: reception@dentistsonstarkey.com.au

Mining Engineer with 3+ years experience required for Asian adventure | Travel to anywhere in Asia Pacific on time off | Earn tax free USD

  • Gain expat experience and travel
  • Tax Free USD
  • Gain valuable leadership experience

RecruitR is currently partnered with a leading organisation that is seeking to appoint a Mining Engineer to one of their operations in South East Asia.

In this role you will be reporting to the Technical Services Manager and will be responsible for developing mine plans as well as mentoring national engineers. The key focus of this role is to contribute to the safe and efficient extraction of coal through accurate & timely mine planning & scheduling.

We are not necessarily looking for someone that has extensive experience; we are after someone that can:

  • Work in challenging conditions
  • Train and mentor national engineers
  • Have a lifestyle that allows for extended FIFO roster (5 weeks on / 2 weeks off) ? on your time off you can be flown to Point of Hire or anywhere in the Asia Pacific region.
  • Take a positive approach to their work

The successful applicant will require 3+ years post graduate experience within open cut coal mining & relevant tertiary qualifications. Vulcan & XPAC are the mine planning software packages utilised but it is not essential that you have had experience with these. You will need exposure to some software packages though.

This role is ideal for someone with a sense of adventure, someone that wants to gain expat experience and someone that is ready for their next challenge.




For a confidential discussion regarding this opportunity please contact Forrest Briggs on 07 3231 0273. Alternatively, please e-mail your application to forrest@recruitr.com.au

Visit http://www.recruitr.com.au to view more jobs

• Permanent Position
  • Immediate Start
  • CBD Location
Excellent opportunity for a Senior Infrastructure Consultant to join a rapidly expanding IT Services Organisation based in Melbourne's CBD. This exciting opportunity has potential for unlimited growth and will be working within a fast moving and like minded team.

To be considered for this role, you must have the following skills:
  • Solid experience in working in the IT industry, preferably in large and complex environments
  • Design and implementation of solutions involving Windows NT, 2000, 2003 and 2008 server
  • Knowledge of VMware
  • Active Directory and Exchange Server design experience
  • Network and system management and monitoring experience
  • MCSE certification mandatory
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • The ability to work with a variety of people with different levels of expertise
  • A drive for delivering the very best service in the market
Like to know more?

To submit your application, in strict confidence, please apply online using the appropriate link below. Alternatively, for a confidential discussion, please contact Jackie Bozinovski in our Melbourne office on 03 9623 6678, quoting Ref No. 3B/51493

Your interest will be treated in the strictest of confidence. Apply

- Senior.
A qualified stylist is required for a fulltime position. Must be outgoing and have up to date skills. All calls confidential.

JobInformation.JobTitle: MANAGER - Accountant - Tax & Business Services – Focus also on Fun Stuff?
JobInformation.JobBody:
MANAGER

Tax & Business Services Accountant
Location - Subiaco

Someone once told me that being a good Manager means being able to delegate to your team, because as individuals, they should  add value to projects and to their Manager. That is what you will get with these guys:
  • Focus on the more interesting (and let’s face it, fun) issues of people management, like providing them with the right technical challenges at the right time of their career so they develop into the Accountant they want to be.
Engaging a team like this is will be a relief to you if you’re used to having to keep a close eye on people:
  • These guys are pretty on the ball, prevents avoidable write-offs
  • Because they can be trusted from day one you’ll be able to assimilate easily, without unnecessary after hours work just to catch up.
It also gives you room to get more involved with the consulting side of the practice, which is particularly good right now because there is a distinct movement towards more tax advisory assignments.

Partners are young in spirit, but mature professionals, and they encourage Managers and Senior staff to get out around Perth and meet clients as often as practical, to give a human face to the business and to let you better understand clients as people.

This also puts you in a better position to establish your own project pipeline:
  • Being at ground level you can more easily investigate new service areas to offer to existing clients, and even be introduced to potential clients by default.
  • That’s a handy skill to develop if you are wanting to make partner within the next two years.
CA or CPA qualified with 6yr + experience and open management style.

Click the "APPLY" button below and I will call you to confidentially discuss.

Email AmyLee@AccountantJobs.com.au

For more information, or to discuss other suitable positions feel free to call me, Amy Blakiston, on (08) 9328 7055 / 1300 696 900 or 0438722264 now/after hours.
